tool.name: OGS: Mesh2Raster
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'Mesh2Raster'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_file' '${$input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; Mesh2Raster #if str($cellsize).strip() != 'None' and str($cellsize).strip() != '': --cellsize '$cellsize' #end if --input-file '$input_file.element_identifier' --output-file output_1.asc

param.name: cellsize
param.label: cellsize
param.help: edge length of raster cells in result. (min = 0)

tool.help: This tool runs the **Mesh2Raster** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
